name: Maple Tale
description:
An adorable game made with Maplestory, Terraria, and Runescape in mind. It has many of the RPG elements (inventory, quests, jumping, killing slimes, cutting trees, fishing), but there are still many things we can add. 

Let us know what you think in the comments!
